sentence: Since  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  Oct.  7,  more  than  1,400  Israelis  and  at  least  3,000  Palestinians  have  died  because  of  the  conflict.

Officials  in  Gaza  say  nearly  two-thirds  of  Palestinians  killed  are  children,  and  that  the  toll  on  the  Palestinian  side  is  likely  to  increase  after  an  explosion  hit  a  hospital  in  Gaza  Tuesday.
